title: Ep. 662 - Don’t Mess With Texas
description:
More than 100 House Republicans back a Texas lawsuit to decertify the presidential election, the Trump administration moves to break up Facebook, and the CDC reports suspiciously low flu numbers during peak season.
If you like The Michael Knowles Show, become a member TODAY with promo code: KNOWLES and enjoy the exclusive benefits for 10% off at https://www.dailywire.com/knowles
